Posts.Content: What a day brightener! Enjoy your flowers! Nancy
Posts.Title: thank you so much!

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for the loss of your dear friend. I will keep her family, and you, along with all of her loved ones in my prayers. Nancy
Posts.Title: With a heavy heart..

Posts.Content: So glad its over and went well! By tomorrow you should just be sore, and not have too much pain. The anesthesia made me really sick the first day, then kind of loopy the second day. By the end of the second day though I was feeling much better, though still unusually tired for another day or two. Nancy
Posts.Title: Thank you for Prayers from Ticky
